subject: Basketball
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Lisa Leslie, a three-time W.N.B.A. most valuable player and a four-time Olympic gold medalist, will retire after her 12th season with the Los Angeles Sparks. Leslie, 36, announced her decision while accompanied by her 19-month-old daughter and husband, Michael Lockwood. A cornerstone of the league since its start in 1997, Leslie guided the Sparks to W.N.B.A. championships in 2001 and 2002.
